LanguageData.PackLossDesc: Enable/disable pack loss.\n Pack loss is a time-based effect if an avali does not have a pack. Recommended for a "full" experience.
LanguageData.PacksNum: The maximum number of avali in a pack.\n5 is usually recommended.
LanguageData.MultiThreadingDesc: Enable/disable pack multithreading. [WARNING: RESTARTS THE GAME.]\nIt is recommended to have this enabled, as it reduces lag greatly. May cause issues with Dub's performance anaylzer.
LanguageData.PacksDesc: Enable/disable packs. These give boosts to your pawns! Recommended for a "full" experience.
LanguageData.EggsDesc: Enable/disable eggs. In case you wanted that.
LanguageData.ShowTextLabel: Ocasionally, avali will display little bits of text. This may lag lower-end computers or games with more colonists, so you can disable it here.
LanguageData.AirdropsLabel: Enables/disables the Illuminate airdrop event. \nThis event adds the "Illuminate Nexus Connection".
